text: Diane Marie Antonia Varsi (February 23, 1938 - November 19, 1992) was an American actress and dancer. She was best known for her roles in Peyton Place and Wild in the Streets. She won a Golden Globe Award and was nominated for an Academy Award. Varsi was born in San Mateo, California. Varsi died on November 19, 1992 in Los Angeles of respiratory failure caused by Lyme disease, aged 54. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:1992 deaths Category:Deaths from respiratory failure Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American dancers Category:Golden Globe Award winning actors Category:Actors from California Category:People from San Mateo, California
title: Diane Varsi
